Are you sure about that? Evolutionary fitness is best measured by the prediction of future presence of genes which correlate with the presence of other genes. By that measure niggers are more genetically fit than whites, because white birthrates are declining, while black birthrates are increasing.
They are more fit for modernity than whites are, even though whites created this environment.

> [side](#comment_5_14APsrL3Vnc8mCdWoXwHh3HM7pzeUkkRd3): Im talking about inferiority though [...]

There is only one measure of superiority in evolution, and that is survival. Anything else is just opinionated trash.
